tools.name: Hoe
tools.description: Used to till soil for planting crops.

tools.name: Copper Hoe
tools.description: Tills soil in a 3x1 area. More efficient than basic hoe.

tools.name: Iron Hoe
tools.description: Tills soil in a 5x1 area. More efficient than copper hoe.

tools.name: Gold Hoe
tools.description: Tills soil in a 3x3 area. More efficient than iron hoe.

tools.name: Iridium Hoe
tools.description: Tills soil in a 6x3 area. The most efficient hoe.

tools.name: Pickaxe
tools.description: Used to break stones and clear paths.

tools.name: Copper Pickaxe
tools.description: Breaks rocks more efficiently than basic pickaxe.

tools.name: Iron Pickaxe
tools.description: Breaks rocks more efficiently than copper pickaxe.

tools.name: Gold Pickaxe
tools.description: Breaks rocks more efficiently than iron pickaxe.

tools.name: Iridium Pickaxe
tools.description: The most efficient pickaxe for breaking rocks.

tools.name: Axe
tools.description: Used to chop wood and clear trees.

tools.name: Copper Axe
tools.description: Chops wood more efficiently than basic axe.

tools.name: Iron Axe
tools.description: Chops wood more efficiently than copper axe.

tools.name: Gold Axe
tools.description: Chops wood more efficiently than iron axe.

tools.name: Iridium Axe
tools.description: The most efficient axe for chopping wood.

tools.name: Watering Can
tools.description: Used to water crops. Must be refilled at water sources.

tools.name: Copper Watering Can
tools.description: Waters crops in a 3x1 area. Holds more water than basic can.

tools.name: Iron Watering Can
tools.description: Waters crops in a 5x1 area. Holds more water than copper can.

tools.name: Gold Watering Can
tools.description: Waters crops in a 3x3 area. Holds more water than iron can.

tools.name: Iridium Watering Can
tools.description: Waters crops in a 6x3 area. The most efficient watering can.

tools.name: Scythe
tools.description: Used to harvest crops and cut grass.

tools.name: Shears
tools.description: Used to shear wool from sheep.

tools.name: Training Rod
tools.description: A simple fishing rod that can only catch the most common fish.

tools.name: Bamboo Pole
tools.description: A basic fishing rod that can catch any fish.

tools.name: Fiberglass Rod
tools.description: An improved fishing rod that can catch any fish with less energy.

tools.name: Iridium Rod
tools.description: The most efficient fishing rod. Can catch any fish with minimal energy.

artisan_goods.name: Honey
artisan_goods.description: It's a sweet syrup produced by bees.

artisan_goods.name: Goat Cheese
artisan_goods.description: Soft cheese made from goat's milk.

artisan_goods.name: Goat Cheese
artisan_goods.description: Soft cheese made from goat's milk.

artisan_goods.name: Vinegar
artisan_goods.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

artisan_goods.name: Coffee
artisan_goods.description: It smells delicious. This is sure to give you a boost.

artisan_goods.name: Mead
artisan_goods.description: A fermented beverage made from honey. Drink in moderation.

artisan_goods.name: Dinosaur Mayonnaise
artisan_goods.description: It's thick and creamy, with a vivid green hue. It smells like grass and leather.

artisan_goods.name: Cloth
artisan_goods.description: A bolt of fine wool cloth.

artisan_devices.name: Preserves Jar
artisan_devices.description: Turns fruit into jelly and vegetables into pickles.

craftables.name: Scarecrow
craftables.description: Prevents crow attacks within an 8-tile radius.

craftables.name: Deluxe Scarecrow
craftables.description: Prevents crow attacks within a 12-tile radius.

craftables.name: Bee House
craftables.description: Produces honey when placed on the farm.

craftables.name: Keg
craftables.description: Turns fruit and vegetables into beverages.

craftables.name: Preserves Jar
craftables.description: Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jelly.

craftables.name: Fish Smoker
craftables.description: Turns any fish into smoked fish using one coal, preserving its quality.

craftables.name: Mystic Tree Seed
craftables.description: Can be planted to grow a Mystic Tree.
